title: How to Clean a Fluffy Toy With Shampoo

steps.headline: Dampen.
steps.description: Dampen a ball of cotton wool.

steps.headline: Pour.
steps.description: Squeeze on a few small drops of shampoo on the cotton wool.

steps.headline: Rub.
steps.description: Get the shampoo cotton wool over the fluffy toy. Pay particular attention to the dirtiest parts, such as around noses, eyes and ears.

steps.headline: Rub again.
steps.description: Do this with clean dampened cotton wool. Do this until the stuffed toy appears clean.

steps.headline: Dry.
steps.description: Allow to dry in the sun. Depending on the type of fluffy toy, indirect sunlight may be the safest choice.

text: Dampen. Dampen a ball of cotton wool. Pour. Squeeze on a few small drops of shampoo on the cotton wool. Rub. Get the shampoo cotton wool over the fluffy toy. Pay particular attention to the dirtiest parts, such as around noses, eyes and ears. Rub again. Do this with clean dampened cotton wool. Do this until the stuffed toy appears clean. Dry. Allow to dry in the sun. Depending on the type of fluffy toy, indirect sunlight may be the safest choice.
